SpTB10 - Jehovah Is Our King (1907)


Table of Contents

"Ye Are the Light of the World!" .................................. 5
Jehovah Is Our King .............................................. 12
Workers in the Cause ............................................. 21
"I Am But a Little Child" ........................................ 35
To the Workers in Southern California ............................ 38
To Ministers, Physicians, and Teachers in Southern California .... 42


INTRODUCTORY NOTE 


     AT THE SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA CAMP-MEETING, HELD IN LOS ANGELES AUG. 15-31, 1907, SEVERAL TESTIMONIES WERE READ TO THE CONGREGATION ASSEMBLED. IN BEHALF OF THOSE NOT IN ATTENDANCE AT THE MEETING AND ALSO IN BEHALF OF THOSE WHO WISHED A BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF THE COUNSELS GIVEN THAN THEY COULD HAVE FROM ONCE HEARING THE MESSAGES, MANY REQUESTS WERE MADE THAT THESE TESTIMONIES BE PUBLISHED SO THAT OUR BRETHREN IN SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA COULD HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO READ THEM.
